channel.title: PAR:RNO on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:RNO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: French Car Financier RCI Makes First Foray in Strong AT1 Market
item.description: Renault SA’s car financing unit RCI Banque SA is looking to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond at a time when investors are snapping up this risky type of debt.

item.title: French Car Financier RCI Makes First Foray in Strong AT1 Market
item.description: Renault SA’s car financing unit RCI Banque SA is looking to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond at a time when investors are snapping up this risky type of debt.

item.title: Europe Stocks Muted After Disappointing ASML, Renault Results
item.description: European stocks were muted as investors responded to a slate of disappointing earnings reports, including from ASML Holding NV and Renault SA.
